title: Revelation 10: John's Mission
content: tells of the fifth and sixth angels, it may be expected that chapter 10 would tell of the seventh angel. Instead we read of “another mighty angel” (v. 1) who came down to teach John what must happen before the seventh angel sounds his trumpet and about John’s role in the latter-day events he saw in vision.
